surface_layer.definition: Device that forwards data packets between devices.
common_uses: Connecting multiple devices in a network

deep_layer.mechanism: Forwards data packets based on destination MAC addresses.
deep_layer.origin: Efficient data transmission in a network

examples: A network switch in a data center
